en: After summoning a Persona, power within gradually enhances.
After healing someone, her desire to prevent death strengthens.
After landing a critical hit, he becomes motivated by his own potential.
After strengthening himself, his fighting spirit rises.
After weakening enemies or inflicting an ailment, her will burns brighter.
After analyzing an enemy, her yearning for her friends' trust grows.
After using physical skills, her drive to complete her mission intensifies.
Once his SP is less than half, his competitiveness is incited.
After exploiting an enemy's weakness, his will to fight grows.
Once his HP is less than half, his determination ignites.
